answers.answer: I just got my results today it took two weeks for me to get my results back
I found out in two days. Two weeks? Good grief...
I got my back the same day
I found out the same day... 1 point over..
My first pregnancy I don't even recall getting the results-- because I passed. This pregnancy I got a call the next day for both the 1hr and 3hr... to tell me I failed...
I got mine the same day.....and Passed!
I took my test Friday morning and got my results Monday afternoon.
My doctor doesn't call me if I pass, she just tells me at next appt that everything looked good.
How many weeks were you when you got the test done? I think they may have me take it too. I'm 6mths
The gestational diabetes test is given between 24 and 28 weeks

I just did my 3 hour yesterday and the lab told me my numbers were good right then and there. Then I had an already scheduled appt with my doctor today and she already had them on hand also. 2 weeks is crazy.
I was never told i passed so i asumed no news is good news
I took the 1hr today i hope i get the result tomorrow...

question: Just curious how soon do they let you know if you passed your glucose test or not???
title: test results
